section.header: Why do my consorts seem to be so afraid of me?
section.body: Welcome to Princehood! As a "Destroyer" class you have a big bad rep to live up to/destroy utterly when you turn out to be a weenie. Good luck!

section.header: Wait...I am supposed to destroy my Aspect?
section.body:
Well, it's not as simple as that. Sure, you can go that route and end up the exact opposite of whatever the usual Hero of X is, but you can also destroy WITH your Aspect, and sort of embrace everything about it.
You'd think it would be useful to have such a broad role, but it really only ends up being annoying as fuck without direction.

section.header: I don't feel very much like a Prince.
section.body:
There's two main schools of thought here:
1) You don't know shit about what Princes are, and you actually really do fit it
or
2) SBURB is gonna make you into a Prince whether you like it or not.
Enjoy!

section.header: ... Are these poofy asshole pants REALLY necessary?
section.body: I've heard rumors that you can change up the god tier outfits, but have never found a way yet. Just embrace the pants.
It's like....a cloth tiara. Cuz you're a prince. Do princes even WEAR tiaras? Has SBURB even ever seen a Prince? The questions are endless.

section.header: Question: If a prince awakes in a forest and there's no shit to hear them, is it still wrecked?
It seems that I have rolled Prince. What should I do?
section.body: Learn how to End Things. Ride in. Kill the monster and make out with its captive. Or make out with the monster, who cares.
